attributes.additional_details: Grant the NHS the order of the British empire. It is the we can do for them (oh and a pay rise would be nice too).
attributes.background: During the Second World War the island of Malta and its people were given the OBE for their resilience and strength during moths of hardship and death. The NHS and its staff deserve nothing less. Hundreds of medics and nurses have died and many thousands of lives have been saved as a result.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
